languages.text: {n}Идира тревожно смотрит на Эдельтрада. Затем — на вас.{/n} "Я такое видала. Лучше... нам лучше отойти от него. Изменения уже ускоряются..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира тревожно смотрит на Эдельтрада. Затем — на вас.{/n} "Я такое видала. Лучше... нам лучше отойти от него. Изменения уже ускоряются..."

languages.text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира тревожно смотрит на Эдельтрада. Затем — на вас.{/n} "Я такое видала. Лучше... нам лучше отойти от него. Изменения уже ускоряются..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd...we'd better get away from him. Changes are already accelerating..."
{n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."
{n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."
{n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."

languages.text: {n}Idira wirft einen nervösen Blick auf Edelthrad. Dann sieht sie wieder dich an.{/n} "Ich kenne das schon. Wir ... sollten uns von ihm entfernen. Die Veränderungen beschleunigen sich bereits ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira wirft einen nervösen Blick auf Edelthrad. Dann sieht sie wieder dich an.{/n} "Ich kenne das schon. Wir ... sollten uns von ihm entfernen. Die Veränderungen beschleunigen sich bereits ..."

languages.text: {n}Idira lance un regard inquiet à Edelthrad, puis se retourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai déjà vu ça. On... ferait mieux de s'éloigner. La transformation commence déjà à s'accélérer... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lance un regard inquiet à Edelthrad, puis se retourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai déjà vu ça. On... ferait mieux de s'éloigner. La transformation commence déjà à s'accélérer... »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉焦虑地望着艾德萨德，随后回过头，看了你一眼。{/n}“我以前也见过这样的情况。咱们……咱们最好离他远点，转变已经变得越来越快了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉焦虑地望着艾德萨德，随后回过头，看了你一眼。{/n}“我以前也见过这样的情况。咱们……咱们最好离他远点，转变已经变得越来越快了……”

languages.text: {n}イディラは心配そうにエデルスラドを見てからあなたの方をちらりと見やる。{/n}「前に見たことがある…彼から…彼から離れた方がいいわ。変化はもう加速している…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは心配そうにエデルスラドを見る。それからあなたの方をちらりと見やる。{/n}「前に見たことがある…彼から…彼から離れた方がいいわ。変化はもう加速している…」
{n}イディラは心配そうにエデルスラドを見てからあなたの方をちらりと見やる。{/n}「前に見たことがある…彼から…彼から離れた方がいいわ。変化はもう加速している…」

languages.text: {n}Idira observa a Edelthrad con preocupación. Luego se da la vuelta para dirigir la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Ya he visto esto antes. Deberíamos alejarnos de él... Los cambios son cada vez más notables...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira observa a Edelthrad con preocupación. Luego se da la vuelta para dirigir la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Ya he visto esto antes. Deberíamos alejarnos de él... Los cambios son cada vez más notables...».

languages.text: {n}İdira, endişeyle Edelthrad'a bakıyor, ardından bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Bunu daha önce görmüştüm. Ondan... Uzaklaşsak iyi olur. Geçirdiği değişim hızlanmaya başlamış bile."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks anxiously at Edelthrad. Then she glances back at you.{/n} "I've seen it before. We'd... we'd better get away from him. The changes are already accelerating..."
